LanguageData.PemotilanTolerance.label: Pemotilan tolerance
LanguageData.PemotilanTolerance.description: An experimental mixture of drugs designed to increase the combat parameters of subjects. The drug did not pass the proper studies, but a serious dependence was revealed after consumption. Significantly increases resistance and attack speed for a short time, draining the body.
